price: (Ɔkͻmhyεni), ka sε: ”Me Wura Nyankopͻn, sε Worema me ahunu (asotwee) a Wahyε wͻn ho bͻ no a,
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
